entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Attempts to create delegates from generic methods declared on interfaces throws `NotSupportedException` #100748
  • Ability to generate header file from exports #100747
    Future
  • JIT: Add missing new-style ABI classifiers for LA64 and RISCV64 #100744
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NativeClients/MiscTypes/MiscTypes.cmd #100739
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NETClients/MiscTypes/NetClientMiscTypes/NetClientMiscTypes.cmd #100738
  • Guidance on Compiling C++ Static Libraries with NativeAOT and Method Invocation #100735

Closed

  • Trying to use dotnet cli on mac m1 throws SIGSEGV (Address boundary error) #100749
  • On Windows x64 ABI, struct constructor call does not assign the value to a field directly, while a method call does #100733
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 2/16/2024 1:14:41 AM #98707
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regression ObjectStringIsString #99314
    9.0.0
  • HW Intrinsics CG unnecessary `vmovaps` when calling `Avx2.GatherMaskVector256` #12945
  • Performance regression: few Span Indexer benchmarks are 30% slower #13090
  • [Jit] Duplicate stores when method calling #32401
    Future
  • Severe performance issues in code generation by the JIT #35159
    Future
  • Sub-optimal codegen for incrementing (some) references #12880
    Future
  • Possible null reference exception when starting BackgrounServices #100740
  • performance: In a case, dotnet 8.0 is slower than java 22. #100479
  • [NativeAOT] Issue with Control.FromHandle not recognizing Label in WinForms #100730

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize `MemoryMarshal.Cast` for same type #100750
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use new ABI representation for x86 varargs handling #100746
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fix building error for `error: fallthrough annotation in unreachable code` #100742
    NO-MERGE, area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update .gitattributes #100736
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100734
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.x

Updated

  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Split the HttpConnectionPool into multiple files #100614
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Fix funclet unwinding #100732
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid frequent calls to CertificateValidationPal.IsLocalCertificateUsed #100513
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add FreeBSD-specific logic to pal::get_default_installation_dir_for_arch #100731
    os-freebsd, area-Host, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Delegate creation with optional methods throw TargetParameterCountException when Dispatcher consumes #72922
  • In IIncrementalValuesProvider method Where with CancellationToken is not accessible. #72919
  • Unexpected ```IInvalidOperation``` for ref returning property as a target of member initializer #72916
  • Unexpected conversion error for a deconstruction involving `dynamic` type #72914
  • Meaningless nullability warning is reported for deconstruction #72913

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34806.19 #72921

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to a batching work queue for saving sourcetexts #72926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use string syntax attribute to highlight tests #72924
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify description builder #72917
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify token creation. #72915
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary discards #72925
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove more usages of specialized collections in favor of collection exprs #72918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pin solutions when doing fix all operation #72909
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move some tests over to being raw strings #72923
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve asset hints to speed up searching #72902
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to using index operator #72911
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify code using SyntaxFactory. #72901
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix returning valid pp symbol info on unrelated preprocessor directives #72910
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Provide API to determine assembly for a give route #55004
  • ConsumesAttribute when Request.ContentType is null #55003
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55002
  • Move FromServicesAttribute to Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #55000
  • Inconsistent model binding between `IFormFileCollection`, `IReadOnlyList<IFormFile>` and other collection types #54999
  • Blazor: NavigationManager.NavigateTo external URL sometimes throws ObjectDisposedException on HttpResponseStreamWriter #54997

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #54996

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54986
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.19
  • [release/6.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54985
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.30

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker not working on macOS #21691
  • Migrating LegacySecureStorage on Android doesn't work #21688
  • [net9.0] Cannot build net9.0 branch locally for iOS #21687

Closed

  • UITextAlignment.Justified not working on iOS #20826
  • .NET Maui release build crashes but debug build is fine #18870
  • .NET MAUI (and Xamarin) deployment / debug hangs up on Android when there is more than one Visual Studio open #21690

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Add default FilePickerFileTypes #21689

Updated

  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Catalyst,Windows] Allow drag item from outside the app #21684
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DbSet AddRange is not inserting the whole range of entries, if an exception is thrown in at least one of them. Is this expected? #33490
  • SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true failed in C.I. #33489
  • Auto-compiled model generates error after entity type rename #33487
  • Invalid SQL generated in Table-per-hierarchy with discriminator configuration #33486

PullRequests

Created

  • Debug messages intended for shadow properties should not be logged for indexer properties #33488

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
